english_translation: Don't fear the darkness, darkness is not eternal
In the place where there is light, fear has no victory.

kannada_original: ಸುರಿದು ನಂಬಿಕೆ ತೈಲ, ಇಡು ಸೊಡರ ಸಾಲಾಗಿ ;
english_transliteration: Suridu nambike taila, iḍu soḍara sālagi ;
english_translation: Pour the oil of trust, keep the lamps in a row;

kannada_original: ಹಚ್ಚು ನೀ ಹೊಸ ಹಣತೆ – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Haccu nī hosa haṇate – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: You light the new lamp – Dear Rama.
